experience.description: Collaborate with faculty to analyze large datasets using R and Python. Apply statistical methods to identify trends in historical financial data and assist in the preparation of academic reports.
Provided individual and group tutoring for undergraduate courses including Calculus III, Linear Algebra, and Probability Theory. Simplified complex mathematical concepts for a diverse student body.
Maintained and updated client databases with high accuracy. Utilized Advanced Excel functions to organize raw data for senior analysts and assisted in basic descriptive statistical analysis.

metadata.experience_level: No prior experience in job field
